website_summaries.verdict: This treat is made from 100% pure USA beef liver and is a good option for overweight dogs.
pros: 5 calories per treat, and treats are high in protein
Made from 100% pure USA-sourced and made beef liver that is freeze-dried raw
Easy to break into smaller pieces
Also available in a variety of smaller bags
cons: Reports that some of these arrived crushed, and that some pets didn't like them

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!! Not worth the risk. This is the second bag I’ve received with beef liver treats wrapped in paper film!!! My dog LOVES these and I’ve purchased in the past without any issues. She started choking on a small piece and that’s when I discovered the paper film. Thought it was just a bad batch until next bag arrived with the same paper lined liver treats. These are the ONLY treats my dog will eat... but not anymore. Please inspect before feeding to your dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves the but they have an issue. ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the but they have an issue. If you break a piece apart you will find it has a thin paper inside them. Not all of the pieces but a lot of them at least my bag. I guess it is to keep the liver in square pieces but when my dog gagged on it and I took it out of his mouth it was plain to see these liver treats are made with paper. I looked inside the bag and took a few pieces out and sure enough. Anyone else?????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CRUSHED INTO POWDER?
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy loves these, and this is my second time ordering these treats! PROBLEM IS, I didn’t pay $20 for them to come completely crushed into powder! This giant bag is completely unusable and has been reduced to bits. Disappointed, because these used to be our favorite natural treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: These are defiantly the heathy option for my Dog. I have a Bulldog named Rocco and he loves these treats and because they are all natural, i don't mind giving these to him. Most bulldogs have problems with allergies and giving him certain types of food and treats will just add to the problem but we have been giving him these treats for years and no problem. I have suggested these to friends and I am yet to have anyone say that their animal did not like these. Pros All natural He loves the taste Great price and cheaper than the pet-store Cons None what so ever! If my review was helpful, please click the YES tab below. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Dawson

customer_reviews.title: HUGE pieces!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always gotten Bison Liver treats for my mini-doxies. They are SMALL DACHSHUNDS.....not German Shepherds! I have always purchased Bison Liver treats from PureBites in the past - and now they are no longer available?!?!?!!! The Bison Liver treats are SMALL! These Beef Liver treats are HUGE! And this attestation on the product - "they can be easily broken down into smaller pieces" - BALONEY! I have to use a knife to cut them into appropriate sizes for my two "kids". And they DON'T like these anywhere near as much as they do the Bison Liver treats! What happened to those???? I have two unhappy "kids" with big sad eyes looking at me as I submit this!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Linkins

customer_reviews.title: I WAS CHEATED by the producer when  I bought  these...
customer_reviews.text: I WAS CHEATED when I bought these. At the bottom inside my bag the manufacturer put in foam filler pieces of about several cubic inch size., which you don't discover at first. Those, in-and-of themselves, are inedible by the dog, and just take up room in the bag to reduce the volume so less product is put in.. Product reduction, looks like around 10% to 20% . Also these foam pieces have 1⁄2 inch size WORMS crawling in and out which must be from production date as I have always kept the bag sealed.. [Less than one star.] Calling the manufacturer yields no relief: who keeps a sales eceipt after a couple of months?
customer_reviews.author: James de Juste

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this healthy treat!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these!!! I needed to find a healthy alternative to the treats I have been feeding my dogs. One of my dogs recently came down with pancreatitis. I’m wondering if it was due to some of the treats I was giving her. After I got her out of the hospital I stopped at a pet store down the street looking for something healthy to snack on and they recommended this freeze dried liver. A tiny bag was $6.00. I then looked on Amazon And found I could buy a huge bag for $19.99. I’m very happy with my purchase, as are my dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: The treats Lonnie Dog told me to buy
customer_reviews.text: Lonnie Dog makes me buy him only the best. He only speaks in a human voice, when he wants something to eat or extended belly rubs. When he mentioned that I should buy these, I had no choice. Seriously, he's a talking dog. It's probably not advisable to say no to a talking dog. Regardless of the oddity of being told to buy these by a dog possessing a voice mildly reminiscent of Boris Karloff, Lonnie Dog really enjoys them. The bag is quite full, unlike EVERY bag of potato chips I have ever bought. If you love your pup, or if he talks, you need to grab these.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The Ideal Treat
customer_reviews.text: These are just about the perfect treat. I use them for training because they can easily be broken into any size piece. Even just a crumb seems to motivate most dogs. They LOVE this stuff and I don't mind feeding a bunch of it during training because it doesn't have a bunch of garbage - just pure beef liver. The only thing I might say is that, if you don't have at least average finger strength, some pieces may prove difficult to break up, as some are a bit thick and/or hard. Shouldn't be a problem for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: My very picky Great Dane loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My Great Dane LOVES these treats. She is super-finicky and turns her nose up at the majority of treats we’ve tried. This makes training tough, since she isn’t motivated by treats she doesn’t care for. These are perfect. She seems to love the taste. The size is good for an anytime treat, and they can easily be snapped into smaller pieces for when we are working on a new skill or refreshing old ones. They smell pretty gross, but I guess there’s not really any way to make liver smell good. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: DaneMom

customer_reviews.title: Wish they could ship without destroying product
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves product, but it arrived today less than intact. There are large pieces at the top but over half of the bag was made up shards and dust. I dumped the bag in a bowl to separate pieces from dust and small tiny pieces.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves these, but not the price changes
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Chewy loves these treats and really listens and wants to train when I offer these. They have a strong liver/beefy scent, so it does stick to your fingers, but it gets your dogs attention. Most of the bag are full size treats with mininal debris at thw bottom. I deducted a star because i wanted to reorder more! BUT the pricing changed. The bag i had previously ordered wwnt up $7! Looking through their options the prices are off. Why is the 16oz bag $8 more than the 16.6oz bag?!!! Why is the 16oz bag $28 but the 16.6oz bag $20? These are great treats, I'd love to keep reordering if the company changes/improves their pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Great training treat
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, these liver treats are slices, not chunks. Slices are easier to break/cut into smaller pieces. I carry these with me in a baggy when I hike with my three dogs. These treats definitely make it worthwhile for them to recall even when they are having a great time running free. They are not messy like meat or cheese treats and not affected by hot weather. The powder at the bottom of the bag is never wasted as the dogs enjoy it sprinkled over their dinner. I will be buying PureBites regularly with my monthly Subscribe and Save order.
customer_reviews.author: E. Comella

customer_reviews.title: Great for training!
customer_reviews.text: These treats are great for training. I usually cut them into smaller pieces and keep them in a ziplock baggie in my waist pouch. My dogs will do anything for them. I even hide them for my dogs to find as a way to stimulate their brains. They love the hiding game. These treats also keep for a while, unlike others I’ve tried that dry out or get nasty. The smell is strong too, which entices dogs.
customer_reviews.author: NavyChiefWife

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but my dog goes bonkers for them
customer_reviews.text: My dog makes it obvious if she really likes treats. I have tried many different types, and I have never had her react so strongly as she does with the PureBites Beef Liver treats! If I pick up the package, she begins doing every trick she knows--she whispers, shakes, leaps straight up in the air, sits, lays down, one after another. I can say I have her serious undivided attention!
customer_reviews.author: Book MavenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: NOURISHING TREAT!
customer_reviews.text: OUR TWO 11-YEAR OLD HAIRLESS CHINESE CRESTED DOGS LOVE THESE TREATS. BEING HAIRLESS WE WERE ADVISED THEY SHOULD STAY ON MOSTLY MEAT FREE DIET SO THESE TREATS ARE PERFECT FOR THEM SINCE THEY ONLY GET LITTLE PIECES FOR SPECIAL OCCASIONS LIKE GETTING READY FOR THEIR DAILY WALKS. WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND THESE TREATS AND WE'RE REALLY GLAD WE COULD INCLUDE THEM IN OUR MONTHLY "SUBSCRIBE AND SAVE" ORDER. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: ejb

customer_reviews.title: Even small picky dogs love these.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has diabetes and pancreatitis and I have to give her shots twice a day. So I needed a treat I could give her after I give her a shot . So now I say come get your shot and she runs to me because she know she will get a treat. I have ordered 8 of these bags and they come always in good shape. These were a life savior for Sassy my Pomeranian. I first bought these at a pet store and they were very expensive for a small bag so I am glad I found them at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann

customer_reviews.title: Dog highly approved US product supplement!
customer_reviews.text: This freeze dried liver is a great way to get extra protein and organ meat into our 16 year old dogs’s diet. He loves them so much that he’ll whine for some as an after meal ‘dessert’! After opening they become just soft enough to snap the large pieces like chalk.. but are crunchy enough to satisfy a dog’s need to chew. And the price point was what I was looking for as a trial. Since my dog just finished the bag it’s time to reorder!!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: The best training snacks I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go nuts for this stuff. Even the cat was sniffing the air with interest when I opened the bag. I mainly use these as training snacks for the new puppy in the house. He will drop everything and come running, ready and willing to work on his commands as soon as he hears the crinkle of the bag. Awesome purchase for dog owners looking for snacks that are easy on dog tummies and are a great bargaining point while training.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Yocom

customer_reviews.title: Freeze Dried Treats Increased Allergies In My Kerry Blue!
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked the flavors and ate them readily, however,she was constantly itching. I had to get allergy shots at 80.00 a pop every 6 weeks. The treats are not cheap either! I finally changed over to Old Mother Hubbard #1 rated baked treat and the itching STOPPED! My vet stated that the processing procedure can cause allergies in dogs. I will stay with Old Mother Hubbard and sock my money in the bank!
customer_reviews.author: judith a.

customer_reviews.title: Great, Non-Perishable Treat
customer_reviews.text: This product is freeze-dried beef liver, that is all. I find the size is too large, so I break up the rectangles into 6-8 pieces. Big enough for a nice training treat, but not so large that our dog (she weighs 80 lbs) gets filled up. So, why not a 5? Largely because some pieces have a membrane on them which must be peeled off before you can neatly break the treats up with your hands. However, I prefer this brand to the one Pet Valu sells because the sizes are more uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Peerce Landers

customer_reviews.title: My pups love these treats!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Placed a 2nd order on 12/9/16 with JNDBRJKSNS. Today is 12/20. The status still says "Preparing for shipment" and "Arriving Dec 30, 2016 - Jan 13, 2017. And now they've disappeared as a vendor for this product and their storefront is empty. If they reappear, I don't recommend ordering for them. One of my pups has to be on a grain free diet. It's not easy to find affordable grain-free treats that he likes. He LOVES these! And I like that they are made in the US. I break up the larger pieces for my small pups. They both get very excited when I reach for the bag!
customer_reviews.author: hildynyc

customer_reviews.title: PUREBITES DOG & CAT TREATS ARE ABSOLUTELY THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I love that Purebites' freeze dried 100% Beef liver treats are truly a soft treat for my dogs. I have 2 small Chihuahuas, 1 with no teeth & 1 missing quite a few. These are both easy to cut down to their size & for them to chew up & swallow. I made the mistake of purchasing another brand of freeze dried liver treats & they're hard as a rock! I love all of Purebites treats both for dogs & cats!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet-Rain

customer_reviews.title: Murphy, a "picky eater" dog loves these treats.
customer_reviews.text: We play chuck it and every time the dogs bring back the tennis ball they get a treat. I've tried many treats over the past two years and even my daughter's picky eater dog loves these treats. He ignores most of the dog biscuit type of treats and walks away disinterested. With the liver treats he tries to be the first one back whether he retrieves the ball or not. I also like that they are healthy treats and made in the US
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one is the best of like products
customer_reviews.text: There are several brands of these on the market and I've bought them all because my dogs adore them!! However, this one is the best because I have little dogs; 3 are quite old and have mediocre teeth. These are softer even tho still dried like the others. Some are just too hard for my doggies old teeth. They are even hard for me to break into a size they can chew.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A

customer_reviews.title: Great value and the dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG my dogs LOVE these! My 11 month old Pit Bull puppy is kind of a picky eater, and when I crushed these on top of her food, she gobbled it all up. Great value, no mess, doesn't stink, dogs LOVE it ~ win win! Photo is of Moo waiting patiently for "another one please"
customer_reviews.author: Moo's mom

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing purebites for about a year now - my dog was diagnosed with diabetes and we needed treats that we didn't have to worry about causing any issues for him. Both dogs enjoy these treats very much! They have a relatively strong smell, so I think that's part of the attraction for them - I break them into smaller pieces (some are small to begin with) and put them in their treat balls and they love trying to get at them and get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McNeight

customer_reviews.title: Love umm! 2 paws up!
customer_reviews.text: My dog isn't a picky eater by any means, but he is IN LOVE with these pure bites. If I open the bag, he will get in his crate, do tricks, anything. He really enjoys them and they come well packed in bite-able pieces (you may want to break some in half depending on the size of your dog.) I would highly recommend them to any pet owner, just be warned, they are only made out of one ingredient, so the smell is very apt to what youd expect. Be sure to keep the bag sealed.
customer_reviews.author: ShaboigonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for potty training!
customer_reviews.text: We just adopted a new puppy (15wk old wire haired pointing griffon mix) - he's a stray farm pup from Arkansas... needless to say, had ZERO idea where or when to use the bathroom. We started using these liver treats at the recommendation of our vet... 3 treats within 3seconds of peeing or pooping outside. He goes nuts for them and is 90% housetrained within a week! Our other pup (3yo westie schanuzer mix) loves them too and is happy when his brother goes outside cause that means treats for everyone! Will be ordering plenty more!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love hate relationship with the price
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love these, but the price of them is ridiculous. I’ve been trying to find a better avenue but keeps coming back to them because they love them so much. So, I now switch them on and off with another treat which they seem to also love.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good training treat
customer_reviews.text: I love these for dog training because they are super easy to break into smaller peaces and my dog loves them. Also, I feel good about giving these to him as I believe they are good for him, well... at least I like to believe so :) They are a little pricey hence 4 stars. They stand out to heat and cold for limited time perfectly well in my opinion. Therefore, they are good on the hike. All around it is a good treat. I have them on monthly deliveries, so yes, would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Piner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Training Treats 🐶
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love these liver treats. They arrived nicely and not crumbly like some other reviewers experienced. I give my bigger GSD the regular sized pieces and the smaller sized ones to my little one. These are quite firm yet not hard to break if you need to. No adverse reactions. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: G. Gables

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It was recommended from my Vet because it's only one ingredient! Pure freeze-dried beef! My dog loves it and loves all the different flavors. It's great for dogs with allergies because there is only one ingredient! I would highly recommend it and will continue to order it! I have also given it to friends with dogs as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My pup's favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: These liver treats are literally dog crack. I try to buy my pup the highest quality treats and food, and with one single ingredient, these are definitely at the top of my list. I use these as high value training rewards and my dog responds to them very enthusiastically. When he sees the bag come out of the cupboard he immediately starts offering behaviors like sit, lay down, and focus because he knows I have the good stuff. I plan to continue keeping these on hand because they're his favorite treat by far!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin W

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it more than me
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, my dogs just love them. I think in my dog’s mind they love this frozen liver treats more than boiled egg yolks I made for them and than I am probably only taking the 3rd place haha~ I tried swap to other treats but my dog will only be excited for a short time and come back to this long time favorite of theirs.
customer_reviews.author: iDOBBi

customer_reviews.title: Happy giving my dogs treats that are nutritious and not full of fillers, and they LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. There is no strong odor, and I like that most of the nutrition is preserved by the freeze drying process. Since organ meat is supposed to be especially nutritious, I feel confident giving these to my dogs since it's just freeze dried liver. No fillers or crap that they shouldn't be ingesting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great High Value Treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes nuts for these. She gets hyper-exited when outside and doesn't respond to any other treat but this one gets her attention immediately. I was worried about it getting crushed during shipping like most other reviewers have mentioned but fortunately it arrived packed well. I break the pieces into smaller ones before giving them to her. I'm checking each piece to ensure that it doesn't have the paper/film other reviews have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: The best for my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats I give my dogs. One is a mix breed (with a sensitive stomach, was prone to vomiting a lot) and the other is a Boston Terrier who suffers from pancreatitis and general digestion issues. These treats are not a problem for either of them. They love them so much, I gather up the crumbs from the bottom of the bag and mix these in with their dry dog food. They go nuts over their feedings now. I've seen a great decrease in digestive issues and vomiting since I eliminated all treats but these. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: CarolAnnNY

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: The dogs both love love love these liver treats. My small dog's brown chewing spots have disappeared since I started using these treats, exactly like what happens if I use Angel Eyes consistently. From a human perspective, these treats are fairly gross. They smell like you might expect dried liver to smell, and some of them look pretty horrid. I'm guessing the manufacturers aren't really picky about the state of the livers they use. Or maybe all liver looks like that. I think they are icky but the dogs have a very different opinion. At least they are not messy. I will probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Liver dust?
customer_reviews.text: These are generally the best liver treats you can buy much better from what you would get from a local pet store. However, the last two bags and we don't order a lot of them have been close to liver dust from the top of the bag. Generally you don't get into those really small pieces until the bottom of the bag but it seem both bags were bottom of the bag treats. We are actually threw out quite a bit. I have another bag coming today so I may update this post.
customer_reviews.author: Peter N.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I break into small pieces and rehydrate for training treats. There are large, thick pieces that don't break easily, and thinner pieces that do. I wish the pieces were the same thickness (thinness, really, so they can be broken easily). Once rehydrated, they get very tacky and sticky in your hand after 30 minutes or so. I usually refill my back mid-way through an hour class and it works ok. This line is very convenient to travel with as you just need a few drops of water to rehydrate it.
customer_reviews.author: KCinSC

customer_reviews.title: These are the best treats, my dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: 12/22/2016 update, I order these all the time, but this time the treats are very hard and no smell, which tells me they are not very fresh. It's necessary for me to break up the treats for my little dog so she can eat them, but these are so hard and dry I can't, very disappointed with this package, not sure if I'll buy them from this retailer again. These are the best treats, my dog loves them. They are very lite and was told by a retailer that sold them, that they are very low in calories.
customer_reviews.author: K. Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Food Snob Dog Approved
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old German Shepherd mix is a huge food snob, even with treats. He is OBSESSED with these though. They stink given the nature of the ingredient, but I got an airtight container to put them in, so we’re good. It came in a big bag full of mostly intact treats (as opposed to the powder and crumbs that I read about in the reviews). These will last us forever, so we’re all happy. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Jarnagin

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these and will do just about anything for them!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a Udemy training dogs to walk on a treadmill videos. These are like crack for our dogs! They hop right into the doggy treadmill when I go near it because they were trained to walk on the treadmill with periodic dried beef treats!
customer_reviews.author: Christa A. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Let Him Choose
customer_reviews.text: My Border Collie likes these 3 to 1 over just about every treat I've used (even Peanut Butter) Try this: Put a PureBites in one hand and another treat that you use for rewards or training in the other. Open your hand slightly and let him sniff one, then the other. Don't let him take it ! Now move away a little and open both hands and see which one he goes for. YDTMV your dog's taste may vary. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rescue 51

customer_reviews.title: Pure flash frozen liver + Bite size pieces = Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Our corgi loooves this treat! He would let me clean his ears, trim his nails, brush his teeth, walk a looong way on the pavement to the park (and he has short legs and hates pavements) if I give him this. Please don't stop making these!! It makes him soo happy. We cut it to tinier pieces so it lasts longer. Attached is a photo of a regular sized fork with the smallest pack for scale, and how pieces of the liver treat looks like. And of course our corgi excited for one more after feeding him one. 😊
customer_reviews.author: iReviews

customer_reviews.title: My dog would not eat these, but he eats sticks!
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats anything... but not these. Shocked me. Glad I bought the tiny bag.
customer_reviews.author: P. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these, but lots of them are just dust
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today. My 5 month beagle puppy loves these so much! Also they are easy to break into smaller piece. One problem is that many of the pieces are broken into dust already, not sure how to give that to the dog
customer_reviews.author: x_x

customer_reviews.title: 100% success!
customer_reviews.text: She absolutely loves these! She's only 12 weeks old and we've been house training her (bell training). she wouldn't do it until yesterday I tried these... she was over at that bell ringing it all evening. She doesn't know it's to tell us she needs to go out yet... but she knows we'll jump and give her a treat if she does it. They break easily into little pieces so sometimes she only gets a teeny bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep stocked well ahead, so we are always prepared.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order for these treats, and the puppy is only 11 weeks old! She has not finished the first bag yet, but I would never want to be without them, so we now have this second bag to be prepared! The treats are fairly flat and about half the length of my pinkie finger. So for a new puppy, each will break into 3 or 4 pieces. We use them for "potty training", and she looks up for that treat! I will keep ordering. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Grammie Annie

customer_reviews.title: wonderful high value training treat
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves this. The pieces are fairly large (about 1/2 x 1/3x 1 inch) but that's OK because I can cut them with a knife to make tiny training treats. These are one of the best training treats I have found (other than meat or chicken) and it doesn't have to be refrigerated. It does tend to crumble a bit in the treat bad but oh well. It is made in Canada of Canadian beef liver so I know it's high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: critter tested critter approved
customer_reviews.text: Almost every critter I own loves these bites- dogs,cats,ferrets, The bearded dragon, hedgehog, hermits, even the goldfish,bettas and plecos enjoy the fine crumbs. Only the robo hamster wont eat it. we tried a couple of other brands, some chicken liver- all were well received also, but the more finicky eaters preferred the purebites hands-down. bought more yesterday. will continue to buy. They are too expensive, but happy critters = less chaos.So worth it- I love that it is liver (just liver) and is low cal- my minpin and shar pei/dobie mix both battle weight problems- we are happy to find treats that won't add to the bulk
customer_reviews.author: Paula M

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs have agreed to let us remain in the house...
customer_reviews.text: as long as I keep a steady stream of these treats coming. Some relatives sent us home with a little bag of these treats, since their great dane puppy loved them so much. Well our little boston terrier mix girls love these with a passion (they love almost all food - but this really gets them going). I love the extremely short ingredient list, since we probably feed out dogs better quality food than we feed ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kemper

customer_reviews.title: My pups love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these! My pups have sensitive stomachs and they have had no problems with these treats! Warning: these do not smell great to humans but are heaven to my dogs noses!
customer_reviews.author: Afulks

customer_reviews.title: Be more careful with shipping please
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but it’s the second time it didn’t survive shipping well. A lot of the liver is pulverized into powder. I’m not returning it but wish to share this issue with Amazon. This is one of the only treats my fussy dog will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My lil yorkie loves them
customer_reviews.text: I have a yorkie and at first he was unsure of the treat, but once he ate it he wanted more:) some of these are cut in big peices, so if you have a smaller dog than a yorkie, you may have to break them in half, which is eady to do. All in all he loves them, i recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SRC Reptiles(youtube)

customer_reviews.title: Training
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive but our go to high value treat for hard training. They are smelly and evidently tasty and both our dogs love them.w We get fish or beef to keep things fresh.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, just wish there were bigger bits
customer_reviews.text: My two pups will stop eating their favorite dinner to get a piece of this. doggie cocaine. Wish there were bigger chunks and not so much dust - although I sprinkle that on their food. Update: dogs now won't eat their regular food without the dust. This stuff is TOO good!
customer_reviews.author: steve fox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Treat for Diabetic Dog
customer_reviews.text: Great healthy treat for dogs; they absolutely love them. Our pup has diabetes so it's very hard to find a treat he can have between meals that won't make his blood sugar spike. These treats are perfect. He loves them and I don't feel guilty giving them to him
customer_reviews.author: sara kawewehi

customer_reviews.title: This is Woofs Up
customer_reviews.text: We had treats like this when we put our dogs to training school at Petsmart last year before this covid crisis. They love these treats and I use the clicker and they do tricks for these treats, & very happily at that!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Branton

customer_reviews.title: You can't get better than 1 ingredient and made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, my dog loves it and every dog I've given it to loves it too - even the finicky ones. I just wish Amazon would stop shipping it in an envelope instead of a box so it gets crushed in transit! Please amazon, put it in a box!
customer_reviews.author: Minorca

customer_reviews.title: Dogs says the love them
customer_reviews.text: Its funny they ask about flavor. Im not gonna taste. Lol. However, my dogs love them. I like there is one ingredient. I have a dog allergic to grain, so he can enjoy without getting sick. Good training too. Can break into smaller pieces for little dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: simple treats, w /no added chemicals
customer_reviews.text: its just liver, dogs love it. can easily break into smaller pieces for training. is hard enough not to crumble, but easy to break apart. good for dogs too. no junk in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Chernoff

customer_reviews.title: 100% beef liver, easy to break, animals love it
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, all my animals love this dehydrated beef liver treats. Both my dogs and my cat will sit pretty as soon as I take the bag out. I like that it is 100% beef liver with nothing other added. The price changes a lot so I try to get a few bags while the price is low. Shipping can sometimes be a bit of a problem if Amazon decides to consolidate your orders by shipping a 2lb item, thereby guaranteeing you will have a portion reduced to power. I prefer the pieces whole but the powder makes a fine sprinkle as a topper.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treat for our dogs
customer_reviews.text: We really appreciate this line of treats, which are healthy and easy to crush and sprinkle over dry food. One of our dogs, a Scottie mix female, will eat anything but our other rescue dog, a 22-pound mystery mix, is a picky eater with a sensitive stomach. We buy premium dry food for them but he's still picky - a sprinkle of PureBites does the trick! We've used the chicken breast, turkey, duck and beef liver, and cheese, but three poultry choices seem easiest to sprinkle. The beef liver and cheese are too hard to crush and too large to give our smaller dogs whole, but we break them up as a treat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NC Reader

customer_reviews.title: Your dogswill love you for buying these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are out of control for these..As soon as they come in they (all 5)they sit in front of where I keep them.they will do anything for these treats.i like that they are dry to touch and no bad odors
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: For Your Dog or Cat, Appetite Stimulant
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. For a nervous eater dog and an aging cat both, we crush these up into a powder and sprinkle on their regular food OR mix with meds. A great find! Pure beef liver - no other ingredients. The price here is way better than at pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Pizza Quixote

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes the taste. I like the price and ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are just one ingredient! My service dog loves the taste, and I love that they are fair priced and that they can be broken up into smaller pieces. Will definitely be purchasing from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Dog LOVES this treat!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them. The calorie count and ingredients are very suitable for my Dachshund who tends to get over weight easily. No odor, staining or bowel problems either. I can easily break them in half. I have never seen him sooooooooooooo delighted with a treat.
customer_reviews.author: earlymorn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up well during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend finding a local retailer and purchasing it there. Most of the pieces were totally crushed to dust by the time they arrived at my door. My dog loved whatever small pieces I could salvage for him, but there were only a few. A real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: StardustGypsy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them but liver has high Vitamin A
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them, smell is good, not like cooking liver - lol. Due to very high Vitamin A level ( in all liver products/ livers) I won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: hb

customer_reviews.title: 100% liver, the caviar of dog treats!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old, 5 lb puppy loves these treats. Each piece is roughly 1" x 0.5" but the are easy to break in half or even into quarters for training-size snacks. I will definitely buy more when we run out. The bag is a generous size and the treats came in good condition, not crumbled at all.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: They smell really bad, but the dogs love it. We use these for special treats and training. I swear the dogs will learn anything if we use these as rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I have a small terrier and cut these up to use as training treats. Housebroken very quickly and good to be able to give her healthy treats.
customer_reviews.author: Navimom

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats too!
customer_reviews.text: One of our cats loves these liver treats. Have to break the larger pieces but much better value than buying freeze dried liver treats marketed for cats.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Beef liver dust!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I purchased this item, it was delivered in an Amazon box. Our dog LOVED the product, so I placed an order for the 8.8 oz package. The Purebites package was delivered in an Amazon bubble wrap bag, and the product was basically reduced to dust. What a huge disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.author: SHN Honolulu

customer_reviews.title: Helps In Rewarding During Housebreaking
customer_reviews.text: My two new puppies love these treats! As weather has been detrimental in successful housebreaking early on, the rewarding of treats after successful outdoor elimination is important! Between the rain, thunder and lightening we've had just about every day since Mother"s Day I'd have had a real problem without their love of these!
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: Unjust increases in price.
customer_reviews.text: EDITED 2/25/19; Original review: My dog loves them, and you get quite a lot in the bag. New comment: in the few months since I bought these, the price for the exact same product went from $18.77, to $28.57 !!! Talk about Greed, jeez. I won't be buying more at this new INFLATED price.
customer_reviews.author: RSM61

customer_reviews.title: quality control is failing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these bites but the last order was terrible as far as consistency. I have ended up with 2 inches at least of nothing but tiny broken pieces! When I first opened this bag I could tell it was not the quality I have had in four other bags. The pieces were not as thick or uniform. Many were very thin. I love the product but am VERY DISAPPOINTED with this last bag! I know they must use different sources but this last source will ruin their reputation. I will try one last bag and if it is as poor as the last one that will be it!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Thomas-Huse

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats! But the reason I gave only three stars is because this item arrived today and a lot of the treats were dust because the packaging was done very poorly. Ive bought these before with no problem. Sad about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Our border collies love them.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 border collies really like that product. They make an excellent treat and are a good nutritional supplement. I have purchased this product many times. Each package does contain a reasonable volume of dried liver "pieces" and dried liver dust. While some my complain, I have found that the liver "pieces" and dust can be sprinkled on our dogs food which turns out to be something they really like, judging from how clean they leave their food bowls. There are no downsides to this product.
customer_reviews.author: El JayO

customer_reviews.title: The taste is great the shipping not so much
customer_reviews.text: My girl absolutely loves these the only problem was the packing which they put these on the bottom of two jar orders I placed and they were totally crumbled. So I have to just it on her food and go to the pet store to purchase. The taste is great the shipping not so much......
customer_reviews.author: Gammy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It; Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great training treats (dogs love); good quality; the 16.6oz bag lasted a year, when I used for my two dogs. Cons: Needed scissors to cut treats into small, training sized treats.
customer_reviews.author: AlleyN

customer_reviews.title: PureBites are a great healthy treat for my 60 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: PureBites are a great healthy treat for my 60 lb dog. However, depending on the packaging, she goes through the same amount in a month or a month and a half. It seems that Amazon has so many of these in stock that they get broken down in pieces rather than their 1 and 1/2 inch treat. So there truly is less to give your dog. I am wondering if I should continue with these.
customer_reviews.author: SBPaddy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them. It is difficult to over-treat since the ...
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them. It is difficult to over-treat since the product is essentially one ingredient without a lot of filler. Also, no worries about overseas meats being used. It is a bit scary how many products say "Made in the USA" but don't mention where the ingredients are sourced. Quality snack that is guilt free.
customer_reviews.author: CameronC

customer_reviews.title: The chunks are pretty large for a puppy
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the Cadillac of dog treats. We used this as a special treat only for potty training, so when she went outside in her designated area she got a treat right away. It seems to be the treat she likes the most. It is definitely smelly. The chunks are pretty large for a puppy, but since they are dry I just break each into a few pieces and keep them around.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren YoderTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These things STINK
customer_reviews.text: The dogs absolutely love these. I swear they will do ANYTHING for these treats. However, they smell SO bad that I literally gag whenever I open the bag. I swear, I don't have problems with odors normally, but these are just THAT bad. I wanted to put out a warning for anyone who has a weak stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: They smell and taste just like liver since well, that's all it is, liver. I've bought freeze dried chicken from this company before but it was so dusty it was unusable. Touch a piece and it would crumble and make a mess. These however are great! Yes, if you put a bunch in a ziplock bag and take your dog for a walk that activity will grind some down so the bag will have some dust along the bottom afterwards but it's not too bad. Most pieces are also easy to break into smaller bits although once in a while you get these monster thick ones. The only downside is they'll stink up your coat pocket! They are very aromatic.
customer_reviews.author: JayJay

customer_reviews.title: Dogs choice
customer_reviews.text: The pup loves these snacks and they are only 1 ingredient. They tend to crumble either during the move or while packaging, so times the pieces are not as solid as I would like. A great healthy snack for your dog without all the fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: These treats are pricey but our dogs love them and we think/hope we are giving them a healthy treat.....made in the USA and only a single ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Setauket Diane

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves these soft treats
customer_reviews.text: I like that they don’t have other things mixed in. They are soft and we usually cut them into tiny pieces to feed our dog.
customer_reviews.author: HE

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are crazy for this treat. This is definitely a healthy option for them so we will be buying it all the time.I
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: Dogs KNOW what this is made of!
customer_reviews.text: Strange texture, but I guess this is what freeze dried beef liver feels like! One ingredient, made in the USA and the dogs love them. A 4 oz bag of these is practically zero moisture, so it goes a LONG way - cheaper than most treats in use. You might think they are some sort of foam or paper but the does know they're LIVER!
customer_reviews.author: Vagabond Steve

customer_reviews.title: My dogs goes nuts for these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is so crazy about these treats that I probably won't be buying any other treats anymore. The ingredients are just liver, which is great. They are easy to break into tiny pieces. My puppy loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these treat
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old Golden Retriever loves these. He is a very picky eater and I mix a few of them with his kibble to entice him to eat, and it works. And I know that he’s getting a treat that is pure, with no additives
customer_reviews.author: DHK

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TREAT
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very picky, but when she sees the sack her tail starts to wag, and she starts to yip! Other treats I have to ask her if she wants one. Believe me, your dog will LOVE THIS LIVER TREAT. And it is soooo good for your dog! MANY VITAMINS.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: finally a dry treat he will eat
customer_reviews.text: new adoptee - am experimenting with amazon add-ons to determine what he does and doesnt like. he definitely prefers the 'wet' treats and buries most dry treats. these weightless little crisps are one of the only dry treats he likes and will eat. am glad I found these. this beef liver went over so well I will now try diff flavors to see of he likes them all. really appreciate that these are 'pure', not loaded with mystery ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: bonanaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: After taking my one difficult to control rescue dog to the trainer, she recommended that we find a "super treat" - something that will break his focus no matter what. These coupled with a water bottle (to initially break his train of thought), do just that. He loves these so much, that he will rub himself all over the pants I wore when I gave them to him. They are also very healthy, so I don't feel bad about treating him too much. He is normally a very picky eater and doesn't like many bones. He had no issue with these and has loved them from day one. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these, and the price is reasonable when compared to department stores. They don't smell too bad and they work as easy reward treats. I've stopped buying my old training treats all together because my dogs enjoy these more!
customer_reviews.author: E. B.

customer_reviews.title: large amount of powder
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the treats but the bag arrived and it must have been crushed because it was half powdered treat and therefore useless. Very disapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

product_meta.title: PureBites Beef Liver Freeze-Dried Treats for Dogs
product_meta.description: Size:16.6Oz / 470G | Super Value SizeGo ahead, turn the bag around and look at our ingredients. PureBites are made with only 1 ingredient; 100% Pure USA Sourced & Made Beef Liver. Dogs love the taste of PureBites because our treats are freeze dried RAW to lock in the aroma, texture and freshness they crave. Dog parents love PureBites because our treats are 100% pure and rich in nutrients for a happy and healthy life. PureBites limited ingredient RAW proteins are sometimes subject to settling dust or dust created by friction within the bag. Some proteins being more susceptible to this than others. The dust has no adverse effect on the actual product and is most often used as a topper for pets food, when the bag is at or near completion.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with Pure Bites

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
